seniority_level.evidence: Minimum of 3 years of experience mentioned, title does not include senior/staff/principal but focuses on 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' which aligns with mid-level responsibilities

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Business Intelligence', core focus on reporting, visualization, and Cognos development

sub_specialty.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) mentioned as required, no explicit streaming tools emphasized

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on development, maintenance, and troubleshooting without explicit mention of leadership or mentoring responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned (AWS, Google, Azure) with no clear primary focus

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google, and Azure explicitly mentioned in preferred technical experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools mentioned as required, no explicit streaming or real-time processing emphasis

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators explicitly mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW projects mentioned, Cognos is a warehouse-focused tool, no lakehouse or mixed patterns emphasized

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Hyderabad, Telangana, India, suggesting regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified, no mention of relocation packages or requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, geo-restriction to India suggests local work authorization

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT or student visa eligibility, strict education requirements (full-time MCA/M.Tech/B.Tech/B.E.)

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit mention of citizenship or work authorization requirements beyond India location

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type stated, no contract details mentioned but benefits and long-term role imply W2

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits explicitly mentioned in Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'continuous improvement' and 'growth opportunities' but no specific career tracks or promotion ladders

mentorship_signals.evidence: Role involves working with business and technical members of the team, suggesting collaboration with senior staff

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit or implied career tracks mentioned (IC, management, specialist, architect)

requirement_strictness.evidence: Strict language used ('required', 'minimum of 3 years', 'should have'), long list of must-have hard and soft skills

scope_definition.evidence: Focused responsibilities around BI/DW projects, reporting, and Cognos development

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with mid-level seniority (3 years experience, Cognos, ETL tools)
